illinois, i as a 5 yr old child, had been awoken to something that was incomprehensible and terrifying. this particular night, i went into my mother���s bed to sleep which was not routine for me. i could see its glow cast just below the foot before it had emerged into sight. it then proceeded to come back and make a turn around the right front portion of the bed and slowly approached me along there. 13 years later, when i was 18, the experience came up in conversation between mom and i somehow, and i learned it was not just a dream. she had the exact, identical experience, same
